price: Mbona hutuletei Malaika ikiwa wewe ni miongoni mwa wasemao kweli?
arabic: لَّوۡمَا تَأۡتِينَا بِٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ
footnotes: Na hadi ya ukafiri wao walizidisha juu ya matusi hayo na kejeli kwa kusema: Laiti badala ya hicho Kitabu kilicho teremshwa ungeli tuletea Malaika wakawa ndio hoja yenyewe, kama wewe ni msema kweli miongoni mwa wenye kusema kweli!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: law mā tatīnā bil-malāikati in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
